questions.text: The individual's knowledge, skills and capabilities are appropriate to the type of work they are seeking.
questions.name: knowledge

questions.text: The individual knows the type of work they would like to undertake.
questions.name: type-of-work-to-undertake

questions.text: The individual is able to use digital technology (computers, apps, software with or without adaptations).
questions.name: digital-technology-use

questions.text: The individual can describe what they need to do, to seek and get a job.
questions.name: can-describe

questions.text: Based on the information gathered I consider that the individual is willing to apply him/herself to job search activity.
questions.name: willing-to-apply

questions.text: Based on the information gathered I consider that the individual is willing and can learn new tasks/sills to help them do a job.
questions.name: learn-new-tasks
